title: FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY Serves A Lower Purpose On A New Single
description: Fit For An Autopsy is back with a new single "Lower Purpose" and boy does it feel more relevant than ever. "Lower Purpose" comes from Fit For An Autopsy's upcoming […]
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 12 hours ago
excerpt: Fit For An Autopsy is back with a new single "Lower Purpose" and boy does it feel more relevant than ever. text: Fit For An Autopsy is back with a new single "Lower Purpose" and boy does it feel more relevant than ever. "Lower Purpose" comes from Fit For An Autopsy's upcoming record The Nothing That Is, which is shaping up to be pretty damn heavy thus far. "You work, you pay taxes, and you expect the people in positions of power and government to serve your needs and the needs of other citizens, when in reality they serve their own agendas," wrote Fit For An Autopsy of the single. "Greed, war, corruption, it's almost impossible to free yourself from this cycle. You inevitably serve a lower purpose." Fit For An Autopsy will hit the road with Bodysnatcher, Distant, Sylosis, and Judiciary later this month. The tour kicks off on October 18 in Worcester, MA and wraps up in New Haven, CT on November 17. Get those dates below, get your tickets here, and pre-order The Nothing That Is right here. 10/18 Worcester, MA The Palladium10/19 New York, NY Irving Plaza10/20 Philadelphia, PA Theatre of Living Arts10/22 Baltimore, MD Baltimore Soundstage10/23 Charlotte, NC The Underground10/24 Atlanta, GA The Masquerade (Heaven)10/25 St. Petersburg, FL Jannus Live10/26 West Palm Beach, FL Banyan Live10/28 Houston, TX House of Blues10/29 San Antonio, TX Vibes Event Center10/30 Dallas, TX Granada Theater11/1 Mesa, AZ Nile Theater11/2 Santa Ana, CA Observatory OC11/4 Sacramento, CA Ace of Spades11/5 Portland, OR Roseland Theater11/6 Seattle, WA El Corazón11/8 Salt Lake City, UT The Complex11/9 Denver, CO Summit11/10 Wichita, KS TempleLive11/12 Minneapolis, MN Varsity Theater11/13 Chicago, IL Metro11/14 Detroit, MI St. Andrew's Hall11/15 Cleveland, OH House of Blues11/16 McKees Rocks, PA Roxian Theatre11/17 New Haven, CT Toad's Place Want More Metal? html:
Fit For An Autopsy is back with a new single "Lower Purpose" and boy does it feel more relevant than ever. "Lower Purpose" comes from Fit For An Autopsy's upcoming record The Nothing That Is, which is shaping up to be pretty damn heavy thus far.

"You work, you pay taxes, and you expect the people in positions of power and government to serve your needs and the needs of other citizens, when in reality they serve their own agendas," wrote Fit For An Autopsy of the single. "Greed, war, corruption, it's almost impossible to free yourself from this cycle. You inevitably serve a lower purpose."

Fit For An Autopsy will hit the road with Bodysnatcher, Distant, Sylosis, and Judiciary later this month. The tour kicks off on October 18 in Worcester, MA and wraps up in New Haven, CT on November 17. Get those dates below, get your tickets here, and pre-order The Nothing That Is right here.
